pullrequest.title: Task 2: New solar panel texture for better contrast

content.raw: This definitely seems to lighten it up, so that's an improvement.  I guess the biggest problem may be if we end up lightening *everything*, then it will just blend in together.  We'll just have to keep an eye out for that.  Otherwise, I think this is an improvement, so I'll approve.
content.html: This definitely seems to lighten it up, so that's an improvement. I guess the biggest problem may be if we end up lightening everything, then it will just blend in together. We'll just have to keep an eye out for that. Otherwise, I think this is an improvement, so I'll approve.
